description: Amber Adventures (Private) Limited Vs Athma Dilukshi Jayaratne, Divisional Secretary, Udapalatha and six others. before Hon. K.M.G.H. Kulatunga, J.
parties: Amber Adventures (Private) Limited Vs Athma Dilukshi Jayaratne, Divisional Secretary, Udapalatha and six others.
keywords: Writ of Prohibition • Mala fides • Abuse of power • Ultra vires act • Collateral purpose • Cable car project • Divisional Secretary’s powers
legistation: Article 140 of the Constitution of Sri Lanka — confers writ jurisdiction on the Court of Appeal. • Mines and Minerals Act, No. 33 of 1992 — basis of the respondent’s unlawful complaint. • Urban Development Authority Law, No. 41 of 1978 — under which the project was approved.
